data.partBlankContent: In her isolation, she discreetly had an illegitimate daughter with a marine officer. Later, she pas___ the ch___ off a_ the daug____ of h__ secretary, in or___ to ke__ the lit___ girl cl___ to h__. In 1787, she purchased the Élysée Palace from Louis XVI and had a hamlet constructed there.
data.fullContent: In her isolation, she discreetly had an illegitimate daughter with a marine officer. Later, she passed the child off as the daughter of her secretary, in order to keep the little girl close to her. In 1787, she purchased the Élysée Palace from Louis XVI and had a hamlet constructed there.
data.answer: 在她被隔离期间，她秘密地与一名海军军官生了一个私生女。后来，她把这个孩子冒充成她秘书的女儿，以便让这个小女孩留在她身边。1787年，她从路易十六手中买下了爱丽舍宫，并在那里修建了一个小村庄。
